theoryOfChange: The Union of Concerned Scientists (UCS) has a published "UCS Strategic Plan 2023-2027," which they explicitly refer to as a "five-year strategic framework." This document outlines their long-term vision, five ambitious goals, and five-year outcomes, detailing how science coupled with effective advocacy plays a major role in shaping choices for a healthy planet and safer world. The framework reflects bold new investments in science and scientists, increased teamwork across programs, campaigns, and partnerships, and a firm conviction in creating a better future. The plan also details strategies for advancing science-based solutions to urgent problems, including climate change emissions, transportation systems, food, nuclear weapons, and decision-making and elections.
